FuncDef:
The netstream export packet-len ethernet-crc command configures the IN_BYTES field value in NetStream packets to include the Ethernet header and CRC lengths.
The undo netstream export packet-len ethernet-crc command restores the default setting. The netstream export packet-len ethernet-crc command configures the IN_BYTES field value in NetStream packets to include the Ethernet header and CRC lengths. The undo netstream export packet-len ethernet-crc command restores the default setting. By default, the value of the IN_BYTES field in the NetStream packet sent by the device is the value of the len field in the IP packet header.
